name: Run To The Flag
description:
Warning: music on menu is very loud!

My first ever attempt to make a "platformer". Turned out controls are pretty complicated! One hour was not enough to really design a level (don't even mention levelS).

I developed this game for the One Hour Game Jam,on Sep 1, 2020, theme was "Flags".

Controls:

  • Q: Move left
  • D: Move right
  • Space: Jump
  • Escape: pause
